name: Razor
overview: "Razor" is an horizontally scrolling shoot-em-up at the moment,but I will include stages of vertically scrolling too. It's very classic stuff, with power ups,end of level guardians and interesting graphics.I'm trying to put a nostalgic feeling to it, making resemblance to good old Amiga games of 1990-91, like R-Type,Z-Out,and the superb Project-X.The last is hard to beat, but I wanna make my game the best as I can.
